justification: Proposal barely models Team B’s mindset. It ignores B’s elite RB value, existing TE strength (has a Tier 1 TE), and preference for high-upside/injured targets with playoff edges. Throw-ins are low-tier (two Tier 4 TEs, Tier 5 rookie WR) and don’t match B’s needs despite liking rookies. Rationale is Team A–centric and generic. While a 3-for-1 is structurally coherent, it’s value-incoherent for a 7–1 team giving up a Tier 1 RB.
